1.0.name: wordpress/wp-basic-seo-meta
1.0.description: This is a simple meta tag plugin for wp head. When activeated a new meta box will appear in post, and page edit sections of wordpress admin panel. The seo meta box will allow for adding meta tag content in wp head, such as keywords, description and page/artical author.
